twoSetSkill.name: Shadow Dancer 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When a single hit taken deals more than 20% HP in DMG, ignore the DMG dealt by said hit. CD: 25s.

threeSetSkill.name: Ten Braves 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Buffs provided by each stigmata of the stigmata set gain a 15% bonus. Mei or Yae Sakura equip bonus: Gain 20% Max HP in battle.
